/var/opt/gitlab.description: Choose a Share for GitLab repositories. Eg: create a Share called gitlab-repos for this purpose alone.
/var/opt/gitlab.label: Repository storage

/etc/gitlab.description: Choose a Share for GitLab configuration. Eg: create a Share called gitlab-config for this purpose alone.
/etc/gitlab.label: Config storage

/var/log/gitlab.description: Choose a Share for GitLab log files. Eg: create a Share called gitlab-logs for this purpose alone.
/var/log/gitlab.label: logs storage

VIRTUAL_HOST.description: Specify the virtual host name to add to the nginx proxy.
VIRTUAL_HOST.label: Virtual Host

LETSENCRYPT_HOST.description: Specify the virtual host name for letsencrypt - likely the same as the virtual host.
LETSENCRYPT_HOST.label: Letsencrypt Host

LETSENCRYPT_TEST.description: Specify using letsencrypt test or production certificate generation.
LETSENCRYPT_TEST.label: Letsencrypt test(true/false)
